'''''Vinyar Tengwar 5''''' is the fifth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|4|6}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Daeron demonstrating the Certhas to Thingol in Nivrim" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Quenya Higher Oral Paper" — Jenny Coombs
* "''Essitalmar''" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Translation from the Auld Elvish" — Arden R. Smith
* "Glossaries from the '[[Etymologies]]', Part I" — Ronald Kyrmse
